<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Choosing a Course Book</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wählen eines Kurs-Buches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choix d'un livre de cours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolhendo um livro do curso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scelta del libro di corso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή ενός βιβλίου σειράς μαθημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elegir un libro del curso</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an article in the ETNI magazine RAG, which gives recommendations and advice on how to choose a Course Book which is suited ot one's students needs .</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">text books</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Artikel im ETNI Zeitschrift 
LAPPEN, der Empfehlungen gibt und Rat auf, wie man ein Kurs-Buch, das 
entsprochenes ot irgendjemandes Kursteilnehmer ist, benötigt wählt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un article dans le CHIFFON de magazine 
d'ETNI, qui donne des recommandations et le conseil sur la façon 
dont choisir un livre de cours qui est ot convenu ses étudiants a 
besoin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um artigo no PANO do compartimento de 
ETNI, que dá recomendações e o conselho em como escolher um livro 
do curso que seja ot servido one's estudantes necessita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un articolo nel PANNO dello scomparto di 
ETNI, che dà le raccomandazioni ed il consiglio su come scegliere un 
libro di corso che è ot adatto i suoi allievi ha bisogno di.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα άρθρο στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών ETNI,
το οποίο δίνει τις συστάσεις και τις συμβουλές για το πώς να 
επιλέξει ένα βιβλίο σειράς μαθημάτων που είναι ανταποκριμένο 
ot στις ανάγκες σπουδαστών κάποιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un artículo en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, que da recomendaciones y el consejo sobre 
cómo elegir un libro del curso que sea ot satisfecho sus estudiantes 
necesite.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textbücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">manuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livros de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">manuali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλία κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libros de texto</string>
          </keyword>
